Posts.Content: Hello fellow survivors! I'd like to invite individuals with Post Breast Therapy Pain Syndrome (including: chronic chest wall pain, scar pain, arm pain, and/or neuropathy following breast surgery and/or radiation) to join my Facebook group: Post Breast Therapy Pain Syndrome: Thank you Admin. As you are advertising and soliciting our members, links have been removed. If anyone is interested please PM this poster. Please read forum rules.
Posts.Title: Post Mastectomy Pain Syndrome Support Group
